document.full_text: officials throughout wisconsin were conducting their county canvasses on thursday, the final review of voting records that will allow the state to certify this week's closely watched elections.
document.title: wisconsin certifying votes, girding for recount in judge race
lines_and_colors: officials throughout wisconsin were conducting their county canvasses on thursday, the final review of voting records that will allow the state to certify this week's closely watched elections.
